item.title: Report E-2024100315
item.description:
Report E-2024100315

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-12T21:13:18+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-09-19
  • City: PORTLAND
  • State: OR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: HAWAIIAN AIRLINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During the inital descent of HA26 from HNL-PDX (N382) a apple Ipad became stuck in a lie flat first class seat (2G) and when the passenger retracted the seat the ipad was crushed. Flight Attendants removed Ipad from the seat and placed the ipad in a fire containment bag per documented procedures. Smoke was prsent in the cabin. Fire was not present.
